Membership  

The Los Angeles Public Library is bigger than a building and more than books. Support from our Members is crucial in helping us transform the lives of millions of people in Los Angeles. Your gift invests in new readers, helps students of all ages succeed, builds the virtual library, and supports innovative cultural programming.


To learn more about Membership please contact Megan Hamilton, Membership Director at membership@lfla.org or 213.292.6242

Library Associates

Leadership Circle

Supporter 

1 YR $50 | 2 YRS $85

Join/Renew Now

Gift a Membership
  • 100% Tax-Deductable
  • Personalized Membership card
  • Advance electronic notice of ALOUD programs
  • Invitations to Members-only programs and events, including the annual Book Drop Bash
  • Discount on ticketed Library Foundation events
  • 15% discount at The Library Store
  • Members-only access to preview The Library Store’s annual summer sale*
  • Subscription to the Library Foundation’s quarterly newsletter
  • Free admission and store discounts at Southern California museums and institutions during Member Appreciation Days

Give the gift of Membership to your friends, family, colleagues and we'll send directly to your recipient, or mail the gift to you to deliver personally. Members enjoy 12 full months of critically acclaimed programs that bring together today’s brightest thinkers, invitations to special events, discounts, and so much more.
If you'd like to purchase multiple memberships, please contact us directly.
